title: Whispers in the Woods, Vol. 2
description: All Evie wants is a little bit of normal in her life-- is that really too much to ask?Lucas isn't normal, but he makes her happy. That should count for something. Evie thinks she can find a balance that will let her be normal and also be with him. Of course she hadn't counted on adding his family into the mix, or his ex-girlfriend.Life with an elf is never boring.
author: T.J. Dell
